Module.GetByUser: SELECT moduleid FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNametbUserModule WHERE usernum={0} ORDER BY moduleidx
Module.DelUserModule: DELETE FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNametbUserModule WHERE usernum={0} AND moduleid={1}
Module.AddUserModule: INSERT INTO same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNametbUserModule (moduleid,usernum,moduleidx) SELECT {1},{0},NVL(MAX(moduleidx),0)+1 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNametbUserModule WHERE usernum={0}
Module.SetModuleTop: UPDATE same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNametbUserModule SET moduleidx=moduleidx+1 WHERE usernum={0} AND moduleid<>{1}; UPDATE same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNametbUserModule SET moduleidx=1 WHERE usernum={0} AND moduleid={1};
Module.AddModule: INSERT INTO same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTBMODULEINFO (MODULENAME,MODULETYPE,MODULEPRIV,MODULEARG,PMODULEID,MODULEIDX,IMG) SELECT {0},{1},{2},{3},{4},MAX(MODULEIDX)+1,{5} FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTBMODULEINFO WHERE PMODULEID={4}
Module.MoveEnd: UPDATE same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTBMODULEINFO SET MODULEIDX=(SELECT NVL(MAX(MODULEIDX),0)+1 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTBMODULEINFO WHERE PMODULEID={1} AND MODULEID<>{0}) WHERE MODULEID={0}
Module.MoveModule: UPDATE same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTBMODULEINFO SET MODULEIDX=MODULEIDX+1 WHERE PMODULEID={2} AND MODULEIDX>=(SELECT MODULEIDX FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTBMODULEINFO WHERE MODULEID={1} AND MODULEID<>{0}); UPDATE same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTBMODULEINFO SET MODULEIDX=(SELECT MODULEIDX-1 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNameTBMODULEINFO WHERE MODULEID={1}) WHERE MODULEID={0};

User.GetLoginInfoFirst: select userid,usepwd,ifSavePWD,ifAutoLogin from tbLoginInfo where ipAddr={0}
